Class SmartBezierRouter

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Routing
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Routes edges around obstacles using smooth curves with obstacle avoidance. Generates waypoints that can be used to create multi-segment bezier curves.

public class SmartBezierRouter : IEdgeRouter
Inheritance
object

object.ToString()

Remarks

SmartBezierRouter extends basic bezier routing with obstacle avoidance:

  • Detects nodes blocking the direct path
  • Routes around obstacles going above or below based on available space
  • Maintains smooth curves through waypoints

For simple bezier curves without obstacle avoidance, use BezierRouter.
